item.title: ‘BEETLEJUICE 2’ will mark Tim Burton and Jenna Ortega’s second collaboration together.

item.title: A fall shoot is being eyed.

item.title:
Pedro Pascal to star in ‘WEAPONS’ from Barbarian director Zach Cregger.
Described as an interrelated, multistory horror epic that tonally is in the vein of Magnolia, the 1999 actor-crammed showcase from filmmaker Paul Thomas Anderson.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega will play mother and daughter in Tim Burton’s ‘BEETLEJUICE 2.’
